ProjectTitle: Unravelling early cell fate decisions during human preimplantation development
InitialFeedbackHistory: 27/07/2022 4. [REDACTED] a collection of metadata standards that may be useful for your work are the MIBBI: https://fairsharing.org/3518, for example MINSEQE, MIFlowCyt and MIQE. [REDACTED] microscopy OME is often used (https://fairsharing.org/FAIRsharing.cq8tg2). 7. [REDACTED] have you already considered which repositories you will use? [REDACTED] submission guidelines can also help you to decide which metadata to collect along with your experiments, flowrepository for example uses MIFlowCyt, for transcriptomics EMBL-EBI has repositories (www.ebi.ac.uk/submission). [REDACTED] data for which there is no good disciplinary repository you can use KU [REDACTED] RDR: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr/
